filefoldercustomization: Folder name (date, PENTX, custom), file name (IMGP, custom)
datestamp: Yes, date, date-time, time (not available in Green mode)
languages: English, French, German, Spanish, Portuguese, Italian, Dutch, Danish, Swedish, Finnish, Polish, Czech, Hungarian, Turkish, Greek, Russian
autopicturemodes: Landscape, Portrait, Night Scene, Night Scene Portrait, Standard, Flower, Sport, Candlelight, Blue Sky, Sunset, Text, Group Photo, Pet, Portrait x Blue Sky, Portrait x Sunset, Portrait x Backlight
facedetectionavailable: Yes (up to 32 faces), Smile Capture, Blink Detection, Self Portrait Assist, Self Portrait Assist + Smile Capture, Pet Recognition (1 face detect
qualitylevels: Still: *** best, ** better, * good, Movie: fixed
type: Programmed AE mechanical and electronic shutter mechanism
ruggedizedfeatures: Waterproof (45.9'), Shockproof (6.5'), Crushproof (220 LBF), Coldproof (-10°C), Dustproof (JIS 6)
lcdscreen: 3" widescreen TFT color LCD w anti-reflective coating on cover
shutterspeed: 1/4000 to 1/4 sec (1/2000 - 4 sec in Shutter Priority, Night Scene mode)
constructionmaterials: Reinforced polycarbonate plastic w aluminum accents
videoout: NTSC, PAL, HD (HDMI supports HD Auto, 1080i, 720p, 480p)
sound: WAV (PCM), 32KHz, 16bit stereo, High Speed Movie?8KHz, 16bit, stereo
hdr: Yes. Capture Mode (3 captured images combined to create single image with wide dynamic range) or as a Playback filter (single image processed to have HDR "look")
focusmodes: 9 point AF, Spot AF, Auto Tracking AF, Macro, 1CM Macro, Infinity Landscape, Pan Focus, Manual Focus
ports: USB 2.0 hi-speed, USB / AV out, HDMI (Micro, Type-D)
modeselection: One Shot, Index (6 or 12 thumbnails), Magnification (up to 10X, scrollable), Movie Playback, Histogram, Folder Display, Select & Delete, Calendar
flashmodes: Auto, Flash Off, Flash On, Auto + Redeye, On + Redeye
focuslock: Yes, by pressing the shutter release button half way
typeconstruction: RICOH zoom lens, 9 elements, 7 groups (4 aspheric elements), protective cover w SP coating
whitebalance: Auto, Daylight, Shade, Tungsten Light, Fluorescent Light (D: Daylight Color, N: Daylight White, W: White Light), Manual
